attributes.action: Stop Scottish universities from discriminating against British students
attributes.additional_details: Currently, the only way to stop this is for Scotland to become independent. The government needs to change this so that Scotland cannot discriminate against other nations in the UK.
attributes.background: In Scotland, universities allow Scottish and international students to study for free. But they charge for English students. This is outrageous.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
